summary: Provides classes and utilities to parse, represent, and generate Session Description Protocol (SDP) data used in WebRTC. It models session and media sections, groups, and bit‑mask patterns, and offers conversion between SDP strings and internal objects for ICE candidates, DTLS parameters, RTP/SCTP capabilities, and codec information.
business_intent: Facilitates WebRTC session negotiation by handling SDP parsing and construction, enabling applications to exchange media capabilities, transport settings, and track identifiers required for establishing peer‑to‑peer connections.
